NotificationActions.summary: The actions read-only property of the interface provides the actions available for users to choose from for interacting with the notification.

remarks.para: The actions are set using the actions option of the second argument for the method and constructor.

blockquote.para: Note: Browsers typically limit the maximum number of actions they will display for a particular notification. Check the static property to determine the limit.

NotificationActions.value: A read-only array of actions. Each element in the array is an object with the following members:
